mapper.select: SELECT ord.ord_cd "주문코드" , TO_CHAR(ord.req_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "주문일자", TO_CHAR(ord.res_dt,'YYYY-MM-DD') "납기일자", ordtl.prod_cd "완제품코드" , ordtl.ord_qty "주문수량", vdr.vdr_nm "업체명", pd.prod_nm "완제품명", cd.cd_explan "진행상황" FROM ORDERS ord, VENDOR vdr, ORD_DTL ordtl, PROD pd, COMM_CODE cd WHERE ord.vdr_cd = vdr.vdr_cd AND ord.ord_cd = ordtl.ord_cd AND ordtl.prod_cd = pd.prod_cd AND cd.comm_cd = ord.prog_cd AND ord.ord_cd = #{ordCd}
